sent.orig: Results Students become interested in maths, delighted and even absorbed into learning maths.
sent.trans: 结果：学生对数学有迷恋留连，产生乐学甚至志学的效果。

sent.orig: I am good at Maths, so the Maths teacher was fond of me.
sent.trans: 我的数学很好，数学老师也很喜欢我。

sent.orig: Maths! I'm very good at Maths.
None of my friends shins at maths.
sent.trans: 我朋友中没人擅长数学。

sent.orig: The maths problem is.me work out.
sent.trans: 这道数学题太难了，我解不出来。
